message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident you'll see it as a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget considerations. However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer.  I could come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. This is my final offer.
